name: Of Fate and Light
description:
Sent by the Gods to save a kingdom from a dragon, what seems to be a cut-and-dry subjugation quest turns to be something bigger as you unearth the history of a kingdom in its final hours.

  • Dozens of equipment to discover, each with its own lore for you to piece out the rise and fall of the kingdom.
  • Many weapons and armor grant unique Arts, allowing for build customization for each of the three classes.
  • Interact with the kingdom's inhabitants and look out for hints that may be useful in your quest. Every human has their own story.

TIP: Don't forget to buy armor early!
